channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Retail CBDCs bring unknown 'consequences' to financial system: IMF director
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The IMF's Kristalina Georgieva said wholesale CBDCs, on the other hand, have “fairly little space for undesirable surprises.”

item.title: Balaji pays out his crazy $1M Bitcoin bet, 97% under price target
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The former Coinbase exec settled the high profile wager 45 days ahead of time but remains convinced that a “fiat crisis” is inevitable.

item.title: Coinbase stock will be ‘weighed down’ until US rules are clear: Citi
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: The investment bank downgraded Coinbase stock to "Neutral" amid the exchange's ongoing battle with U.S. regulators.

item.title: US congressmen chide presidential advisers over crypto stances in economic report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The legislators objected to a chapter of the president’s annual report that they believe diminished the role of Congress and could damage the economy with its hostility to digital assets.

item.title: Sports Illustrated launches Polygon-based NFT ticketing platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: SI's new service, called "Box Office," will allow event organizers to issue commemorative nonfungible token tickets, including pre-attendance and post-event audience perks.

item.title: Interest rate hike speculation triggers outflows from crypto investment products: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to CoinShares, digital asset investment products saw outflows totaling $72 million last week, as investors brace for the Fed's forthcoming rate decision on May 3.

item.title: How can Bitcoin hold $28K amid the banking crisis?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses whether Bitcoin’s $28,000 support has a chance amid the recent banking crisis.

item.title: The ABCs of Crypto: Teaching the next generation of Web3 users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: This latest report presents an overview of two of the most popular use cases for blockchain technology — DeFi and NFTs — to help onboard the next generation of crypto users.

item.title: Blur NFT lending surpasses $16M in loans, led by Machi Big Brother
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The milestone comes just one day after the protocol's launch on May 1.

item.title: Student interest in ChatGPT skills on Udemy increased by 4,419% since 2022: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The latest topic consumption report from Udemy shows an increase in interest in ChatGPT as well as skills related to cloud computing and blockchain.

item.title: The average person’s wealth will be 'completely destroyed by inflation,' says Arthur Hayes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: Investing in assets "outside of the traditional financial system” is the only way to preserve one’s wealth, according to the former BitMEX CEO.

item.title: Coinbase officers, board members face suit over alleged insider trading during listing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The suit charges the alleged inside traders saved over $1 billion by selling their shares when the company went public despite knowing they would lose value.

item.title: What is the wash-sale rule, and does it apply to crypto?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: The wash-sale rule disallows the deduction of losses if identical securities or crypto assets are repurchased within 30 days.

item.title: Ether whale population drops after Shapella — Will ETH price sink too?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Ether's supply across whale addresses has dropped consistently since March 2020, offset by greater retail interest.

item.title: 17 factors to consider when evaluating a potential Web3 partnership
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Proper vetting of potential Web3 partners includes looking both at traditional business fundamentals and industry-specific USPs.

item.title: BTC price may need a $24.4K dip as Bitcoin speculators stay in profit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin short-term holders are slowly seeing profits evaporate as BTC price action trends lower, but more downside could be next.

item.title: British MP Lisa Cameron is ‘not invested personally’ in crypto but advocates for regulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: “I’m an advocate for getting regulation in place that makes the most of the potential of the sector whilst protecting consumers,” said the member of Pariliament.

item.title: SEC crackdown on crypto staking in the US could boost decentralization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Recent regulatory actions have crypto staking providers in the United States on edge.

item.title: How to control the AIs and incentivize the humans with crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Max Parasol
item.description: Does AI need blockchain and crypto to incentivise the humans in the loop — or to help keep the robots in line?

item.title: Coinbase International Exchange launches amid SEC crypto crackdown in the US
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The Coinbase International Exchange will roll out trading by listing Bitcoin and Ether perpetual futures.

item.title: Ethereum price outlook weakens, but ETH derivatives suggest $1.6K is unlikely
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Another top 20 U.S. bank bites the dust, but Ether’s price fails to benefit from the event.

item.title: Bitcoin metrics to the moon: ATH for hash rate, daily transactions and Ordinals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: While the Bitcoin hash rate briefly touches new highs, Bitcoin Ordinals contribute to daily transactions exceeding 500,000.

item.title: 3AC founders run into fresh trouble in Dubai over new exchange OPNX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Dubai’s digital asset regulator claimed it had sent two cease and desist notices to the exchange in February and an investor alert against it in April.

item.title: Ava Labs founder awarded $3M in crypto defamation suit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Emin Gün Sirer, the founder and CEO of Ava Labs, has been awarded millions in damages after an influencer publicly accused him of being part of a Turkish terrorist group in 2021.

item.title: Bybit joins crypto exchanges offering crypto lending services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Dubai-based cryptocurrency exchange Bybit rolls out cryptocurrency lending service, joining a handful of major exchanges offering interest-bearing lending facilities.

item.title: Bitcoin price sweeps lows, but analysis still predicts a $25K dive
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: $30,000 and $25,000 form the upside and downside BTC price targets, with Bitcoin caught between a resurgent U.S. banking crisis and the looming Fed meeting.

item.title: ARK Invest grabs another $8M in Coinbase shares
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Despite Coinbase shares tumbling amid its legal battle with the SEC, Cathie Wood is still bullish on the crypto exchange.

item.title: Samsung employees banned from using ChatGPT-like AI tools
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The company-wide ban prevents Samsung employees from accessing generative AI tools on all Samsung-owned devices and internal networks.

item.title: Blur NFT lending protocol gets mixed reactions from the community
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Web3 lawyer Jesse Hynes tagged the SEC and stated that they must safeguard investors from this type of activity.

item.title: Coinbase faces suit over alleged privacy violations in biometrics collection
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The proposed class action lawsuit alleges the exchange violated privacy laws in Illinois when it collected and stored users' fingerprints and facial scans.
